remarks: A (matrix) element of the result of a matrix transformation. (Contributed by AV, 31-Jul-2019.)
statement:
mat2pmatfval.t $e |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) $.
mat2pmatfval.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
mat2pmatfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
mat2pmatfval.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
mat2pmatfval.s $e |- S = ( algSc ` P ) $.
mat2pmatvalel $p |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V /\ M e. B ) /\ ( X e. N /\ Y e. N ) ) -> ( X ( T ` M ) Y ) = ( S ` ( X M Y ) ) ) $.
